bioAsHtml: Lutz is a freelance consultant, solutions architect and trainer. His current focus is the development of reactive applications – responsive, scalable, resilient systems – with Scala, Akka, and Lagom, mostly for financial institutions and gaming companies. He's one of the authors of the upcoming O'Reilly book "Lagom - The Definitive Guide".
